backend

Class DataFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend.DataFacade

  • public class DataFacade
extends java.lang.Object
    DataFacade is a facade for the Mapper classes. It it used to update the tables in the database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataFacade()
      Constructor that instantiates the Mapper classes, DBConnector class and sets the predefined connection from the DBConnector class.
      DataFacade(java.sql.Connection conn)
      Constructor that instantiates the Mappers classes and sets the Connection to the one of the parameter conn.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPart(Part part)
      Adds a row with the data of the Part object designated by the parameter part in the Part table.
      void changeStatusOnSvg(int svgId, SvgDrawing.Status status)
      Updates the status of a row in the SvgTable based on the svgId and the Status.
      java.util.List<SvgDrawing> getAllSvgsWithCustomer(int customerId)
      Returns a List with SvgDrawing objects based on the int parameter customerId.
      java.util.List<SvgDrawing> getAllSvgWithStatus(SvgDrawing.Status status)
      Returns a List with SvgDrawing objects based on the SvgDrawing.Status parameter.
      java.util.List<SvgDrawing> getCustomerSvgWithStatus(SvgDrawing.Status svgStatus, int customerId)
      Returns a List with SvgDrawing objects based on the customerId and svgStatus.
      java.util.List<SvgDrawing> getDrawings(int customerId)
      Returns a List with SvgDrawing objects based on the int parameter customerId.
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Part> getMiscMap()
      Returns a HashMap with Part objects with the category of 'løsdele' with integer keys of the partId and the values of a Part Object.
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Part> getRoofMap()
      Returns a HashMap with Part objects with the category of 'tag' with integer keys of the partId and the values of a Part Object.
      SvgDrawing getSvgDrawingWithSvgId(int svgId)
      Returns a SvgDrawing object with the specified svgId.
      java.util.List<Part> getTypeCategory(java.lang.String typeCategory)
      Returns a List with Part Objects based on the String parameter typeCategory.
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Part> getWoodMap()
      Returns a HashMap with Part objects with the category of 'Træ' with integer keys of the partId and the values of a Part Object.
      void insertSvg(java.lang.String SvgInLine, int customerId)
      Inserts a row in the Svg table based on the String SvgInline and a CustomerId.

      Inserts a User object's data into Customer table in the MySQL database.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataFacade

        public DataFacade(java.sql.Connection conn)
        Constructor that instantiates the Mappers classes and sets the Connection to the one of the parameter conn.
        Parameters:
        conn - requires a Connection.

      • DataFacade

        public DataFacade()
        Constructor that instantiates the Mapper classes, DBConnector class and sets the predefined connection from the DBConnector class.

    • Method Detail

      • changeStatusOnSvg

        public void changeStatusOnSvg(int svgId,
                              SvgDrawing.Status status)
        Updates the status of a row in the SvgTable based on the svgId and the Status.
        Parameters:
        svgId - int value of the svgId.
        status - Enum Status to set. Expected values are CREATED, REQAPPROVED, APPROVED and DONE.

      • getSvgDrawingWithSvgId

        public SvgDrawing getSvgDrawingWithSvgId(int svgId)
        Returns a SvgDrawing object with the specified svgId. SvgDrawing CAN BE NULL.
        Parameters:
        svgId - int value of the svgId.
        Returns:
        SvgDrawing object. SvgDrawing Object will be null, if the svgId does not exists in the Svg table in the MySQL database.

      • getAllSvgsWithCustomer

        public java.util.List<SvgDrawing> getAllSvgsWithCustomer(int customerId)
        Returns a List with SvgDrawing objects based on the int parameter customerId. The List can be empty.
        Parameters:
        customerId - int for the customer you want to get a List of SvgDrawings from.
        Returns:
        List with SvgDrawing objects from a specific customer. The List will return empty if the customerId does not exist in the Svg table.

      • getCustomerSvgWithStatus

        public java.util.List<SvgDrawing> getCustomerSvgWithStatus(SvgDrawing.Status svgStatus,
                                                           int customerId)
        Returns a List with SvgDrawing objects based on the customerId and svgStatus. List can be empty.
        Parameters:
        svgStatus - Enum SvgDrawing.Status to set. Expected values are CREATED, REQAPPROVED, APPROVED and DONE.
        customerId - int value of customerId.
        Returns:
        List with SvgDrawing objects. The List will return empty if the customer does not exist in the Svg table or if the status does not exist with specific customerId.

      • getAllSvgWithStatus

        public java.util.List<SvgDrawing> getAllSvgWithStatus(SvgDrawing.Status status)
        Returns a List with SvgDrawing objects based on the SvgDrawing.Status parameter. The List can be empty.
        Parameters:
        status - Enum SvgDrawing.Status to set. Expected values are CREATED, REQAPPROVED, APPROVED and DONE.
        Returns:
        A List of SvgDrawing objects with a specific Status. The List will be empty if the specified Status does not exist in the Svg table.

      • getTypeCategory

        public java.util.List<Part> getTypeCategory(java.lang.String typeCategory)
        Returns a List with Part Objects based on the String parameter typeCategory. The List can be empty.
        Parameters:
        typeCategory - String value of the typeCategory to set.
        Returns:
        A List with Part objects. The List can return empty if the specific typeCategory does not exist.

      • getWoodMap

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Part> getWoodMap()
        Returns a HashMap with Part objects with the category of 'Træ' with integer keys of the partId and the values of a Part Object. HashMap can return empty.
        Returns:
        HashMap with Parts as value and integer keys based on the partId. The HashMap will return empty if no rows contains the category of 'Træ'.

      • getRoofMap

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Part> getRoofMap()
        Returns a HashMap with Part objects with the category of 'tag' with integer keys of the partId and the values of a Part Object. HashMap can return empty.
        Returns:
        HashMap with Parts as value and integer keys based on the partId. The HashMap will return empty if no rows contains the category of 'tag'.

      • getMiscMap

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Part> getMiscMap()
        Returns a HashMap with Part objects with the category of 'løsdele' with integer keys of the partId and the values of a Part Object. HashMap can return empty.
        Returns:
        HashMap with Parts as value and integer keys based on the partId. The HashMap will return empty if no rows contains the category of 'løsdele'.

      • validateCustomer

        public User validateCustomer(java.lang.String email,
                             java.lang.String password)
        Returns a User object based on the two String parameters email and pass. User object can be null. Should be used when validating a customer.
        Parameters:
        email - String value of the email.
        password - String value of the password.
        Returns:
        User object. Will return NULL if the email or password are not equal to the ones in the Customer table.

      • validateAdmin

        public User validateAdmin(java.lang.String email,
                          java.lang.String password)
        Returns a User object based on the two String parameters email and pass. User object can be null. Should be used when validating a FogUser/admin.
        Parameters:
        email - String value of the email.
        password - String value of the password.
        Returns:
        User object. Will return NULL if the email or password are not equal to the ones in the FogUser table.

      • insertUser

        public void insertUser(User customer,
                       java.lang.String password)
                throws UserAlreadyExistException
        Inserts a User object's data into Customer table in the MySQL database. Throws an UserAlreadyExistException if email is already in the database.
        Parameters:
        customer - User object to be inserted into the Customer table.
        password - String value for password to be inserted into the Customer table.
        Throws:
        UserAlreadyExistException - if the email is already in the Customer table in the MySQL database.

      • addPart

        public void addPart(Part part)
        Adds a row with the data of the Part object designated by the parameter part in the Part table.
        Parameters:
        part - Part object to be added to the Part table.

      • removePart

        public void removePart(int partId)
        Removes the row designated by the int parameter PartId in the Part table.
        Parameters:
        partId - int value of the partId to be removed from the Part table.

      • insertSvg

        public void insertSvg(java.lang.String SvgInLine,
                      int customerId)
        Inserts a row in the Svg table based on the String SvgInline and a CustomerId.
        Parameters:
        SvgInLine - String value with Svg in html.
        customerId - int value of the customerId.

      • removeDrawing

        public void removeDrawing(java.lang.String removeimage,
                          int customerid)
        Remove an row in the Svg table based ont the int customerId and the String removeImage.
        Parameters:
        removeimage - String with Svg in html.
        customerid - int of a customer id.

      • removeSvgDrawing

        public boolean removeSvgDrawing(int svgId)
        Remove a row from Svg table in the MySQL database based on the svgId. Returns true if the it succeded.
        Parameters:
        svgId - int value for the SvgDrawing's id you want to remove.
        Returns:
        True if the svgId existed.

      • getDrawings

        public java.util.List<SvgDrawing> getDrawings(int customerId)
        Returns a List with SvgDrawing objects based on the int parameter customerId. The List can be empty.
        Parameters:
        customerId - int value of the customerId you want to get a List of SvgDrawings from.
        Returns:
        List with SvgDrawing objects from a specific customer. List will return empty, if no rows contains the specified customerId.
